item.title: Trump tax cut plan heads for House-wide vote despite GOP rebel threats, Medicaid anxiety
item.description: The House's version of Trump's budget bill advanced through a key hurdle before a chamber-wide vote.

item.title: Noem reveals major milestone on border crossings amid Trump's crackdown on illegal immigrants
item.description: Encounters at the southern border hit a record 15-year record low, Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem announced.

item.title: Homan issues stark warning for illegals amid clash with sanctuary city officials: 'We're coming'
item.description: Border czar Tom Homan is warning illegal immigrants in Boston that he is coming for them while also hitting back against a local official who attacked...

item.title: Deadline for Musk's ultimatum to federal workers hits, but consequences remain vague
item.description: Billionaire Elon Musk says federal employees will get a second chance to respond to work accountability requests after Monday night's deadline passed.

item.title: Texas governor announces crackdown on massive illegal immigrant community near major city
